DataSource.ScriptBody:
Option Explicit Dim DriverInfo Dim SourceId, ManagedEntityId, sComputerName SourceId = WScript.Arguments(0) ManagedEntityId = WScript.Arguments(1) sComputerName = WScript.Arguments(2) DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(3)
Dim oAPI Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Dim oDiscoveryData Set oDiscoveryData = oAPI.CreateDiscoveryData(0, SourceId, ManagedEntityId)
Dim oShell, entry On Error Resume Next
Set oShell = CreateObject("WScript.Shell") entry = oShell.RegRead("HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\PostgreSQL\Installations\") If Err.Number Then 'Err.Clear 'Wscript.Quit -1 'RegKeyExists = False Else Err.Clear Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo Dim version
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset") '--->db version rs.Open "Select version()", conn
do until rs.EOF version = rs.Fields(0).value rs.MoveNext loop rs.close
Dim oInstance Set oInstance = oDiscoveryData.CreateClassInstance("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.Application']$") Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Windows!Microsoft.Windows.Computer']/PrincipalName$", sComputerName) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.Application']/Info$", version) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.Application']/Driver$", DriverInfo) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='System!System.Entity']/DisplayName$", "PostgreSQL") Call oDiscoveryData.AddInstance(oInstance) conn.Close End If Call oAPI.Return(oDiscoveryData)

Option Explicit
Dim SourceId, ManagedEntityId, sComputerName SourceId = WScript.Arguments(0) ManagedEntityId = WScript.Arguments(1) sComputerName = WScript.Arguments(2) Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(3)
Dim oAPI Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Dim oDiscoveryData Set oDiscoveryData = oAPI.CreateDiscoveryData(0, SourceId, ManagedEntityId)
On Error Resume Next
Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo Dim version
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset") '--->db version rs.Open "SELECT pg_database.datname as " & Chr(34) & " Database"&Chr(34)&" FROM pg_database", conn
do until rs.EOF version = rs.Fields(0).value Dim oInstance Set oInstance = oDiscoveryData.CreateClassInstance("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.DataBase']$") Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Windows!Microsoft.Windows.Computer']/PrincipalName$", sComputerName) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.DataBase']/DBName$", version) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.DataBase']/hostName$", sComputerName) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='System!System.Entity']/DisplayName$", version) Call oDiscoveryData.AddInstance(oInstance) rs.MoveNext loop rs.close
conn.Close Call oAPI.Return(oDiscoveryData)

Option Explicit
Dim SourceId, ManagedEntityId, sComputerName, DbName SourceId = WScript.Arguments(0) ManagedEntityId = WScript.Arguments(1) sComputerName = WScript.Arguments(2) DbName = WScript.Arguments(3) Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(4)
Dim oAPI Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Dim oDiscoveryData Set oDiscoveryData = oAPI.CreateDiscoveryData(0, SourceId, ManagedEntityId)
On Error Resume Next
Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo&"Database="&DbName Dim version
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset") '--->db version rs.Open "SELECT table_name,Current_Database() FROM Information_schema.tables Where table_schema='public'", conn
do until rs.EOF version = rs.Fields(0).value Dim oInstance Set oInstance = oDiscoveryData.CreateClassInstance("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.Table']$") Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='Windows!Microsoft.Windows.Computer']/PrincipalName$", sComputerName) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.DataBase']/DBName$", DbName) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.Table']/DBName$", DbName) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='PostgresMP.Windows.Table']/TableName$", version) Call oInstance.AddProperty("$MPElement[Name='System!System.Entity']/DisplayName$", version) Call oDiscoveryData.AddInstance(oInstance) rs.MoveNext loop rs.close
conn.Close Call oAPI.Return(oDiscoveryData)

DataSource.ShellScript: #!/bin/sh if pgrep postgres > /dev/null then DATABASE=postgres USERNAME=postgres echo "$1;""$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -c "select version()")" else exit 1 fi
DataSource.PSScriptBody: param([string]$StdOut,[string]$StdErr,[string]$ReturnCode) $StdOut = $StdOut -replace '\r?\n','' if ($ReturnCode -eq "0" -And $StdErr.Length -eq 0){ $splited = $StdOut.Replace(" ","_").Split(";") $version = $splited[1] $path = $splited[0] $api = New-Object -comObject 'MOM.ScriptAPI' $bag = $api.CreatePropertyBag() $bag.AddValue("Info","$version") $bag.AddValue("psqlPath","$path") $bag } elseif ($ReturnCode -eq "0" -And $StdErr.Length -ge 0) { $api = New-Object -comObject 'MOM.ScriptAPI' $bag = $api.CreatePropertyBag() $bag.AddValue("Info","$StdErr") $bag.AddValue("psqlPath","path to psql may be wrong") $bag }

DataSource.ShellScript: #!/bin/sh DATABASE=postgres USERNAME=postgres $1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A --record-separator=";" -c "SELECT pg_database.datname from pg_database where datistemplate='f'"
#!/bin/sh DATABASE=$2 USERNAME=postgres $1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A --record-separator=";" -c "SELECT table_name FROM Information_schema.tables Where table_schema='public'"

DataSource.ScriptBody:
Option Explicit Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(1) Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo
Dim dbName dbName = WScript.Arguments(0)
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT COUNT(datid) AS current, (SELECT setting AS mc FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'max_connections') AS mc, d.datname FROM pg_database d LEFT JOIN pg_stat_activity s ON (s.datid = d.oid) WHERE d.datname = '"&dbName&"' GROUP BY 2,3 ", conn
Dim value value = rs.Fields(0).value rs.close conn.Close
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("value",value) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Dim dbName,tableName dbName = WScript.Arguments(0) tableName = WScript.Arguments(1) Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(2)
Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo&"Database="&dbName
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT n_tup_ins from pg_stat_user_tables Where relname='"&tableName&"' ", conn
Dim value value = rs.Fields(0).value rs.close conn.Close
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("Value",value) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Dim dbName,tableName dbName = WScript.Arguments(0) tableName = WScript.Arguments(1) Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(2)
Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo&"Database="&dbName
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT n_tup_upd from pg_stat_user_tables Where relname='"&tableName&"' ", conn
Dim value value = rs.Fields(0).value rs.close conn.Close
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("Value",value) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Dim dbName,tableName dbName = WScript.Arguments(0) tableName = WScript.Arguments(1) Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(2)
Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo&"Database="&dbName
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT n_tup_del from pg_stat_user_tables Where relname='"&tableName&"' ", conn
Dim value value = rs.Fields(0).value rs.close conn.Close
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("Value",value) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

DataSource.ShellScript: ## #!/bin/sh DATABASE=postgres USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT COUNT(datid) FROM pg_database d LEFT JOIN pg_stat_activity s ON (s.datid = d.oid) WHERE d.datname = '$2'") echo "$OUT" ##
## #!/bin/sh DATABASE=$2 USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT n_tup_ins from pg_stat_user_tables Where relname='$3'") echo "$OUT" ##
## #!/bin/sh DATABASE=$2 USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT n_tup_upd from pg_stat_user_tables Where relname='$3'") echo "$OUT" ##
## #!/bin/sh DATABASE=$2 USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT n_tup_del from pg_stat_user_tables Where relname='$3'") echo "$OUT" ##

Configuration.ScriptBody:
Dim dbName dbName = WScript.Arguments(0) Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(1)
Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT round(100.*sd.xact_commit/(sd.xact_commit+sd.xact_rollback), 0) AS commitratio, d.datname AS db, u.usename FROM pg_stat_database sd JOIN pg_database d ON (d.oid=sd.datid) JOIN pg_user u ON (u.usesysid=d.datdba) WHERE sd.xact_commit+sd.xact_rollback<>0 AND d.datname = '"& dbName &"'", conn
Dim value, message
do until rs.EOF value= rs.Fields(0).value rs.MoveNext loop
rs.close conn.Close
Dim key If CInt(value)<75 Then key="c" End If If CInt(value)>=75 and CInt(value)<=90 Then key="w" End If If CInt(value)>90 Then key="h" End If
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue( "Value", key ) Call oBag.AddValue( "Message", value ) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Dim conn Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(0) Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT setting From pg_settings WHere name='autovacuum'", conn
Dim value value = rs.Fields(0).value rs.close conn.Close
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("Value",value) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Dim dbName dbName = WScript.Arguments(0) Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(1)
Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT round(100.*sd.blks_hit/(sd.blks_read+sd.blks_hit), 2) AS dhitratio, d.datname, u.usename FROM pg_stat_database sd JOIN pg_database d ON (d.oid=sd.datid) JOIN pg_user u ON (u.usesysid=d.datdba) WHERE sd.blks_read+sd.blks_hit<>0 AND d.datname = '"&dbName&"'", conn
Dim value value = rs.Fields(0).value rs.close conn.Close
value = CInt(Value) Dim key If value<30 then key="c" End If If value>=30 and value<=70 then key="w" End If If value>70 then key="h" End If
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("Value", key ) Call oBag.AddValue("Message", value ) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Option Explicit
Dim dbName,tableName dbName = WScript.Arguments(0) tableName = WScript.Arguments(1) Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(2)
Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo&"Database="&dbName
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT CASE WHEN idx_scan = 0 THEN 100 ELSE seq_scan::float4 / idx_scan * 100 END AS ratio, relname, seq_scan, idx_scan FROM pg_stat_user_tables WHERE relname='"&tableName&"' ", conn
Dim value value = rs.Fields(0).value rs.close conn.Close
value = CInt(Value) Dim key If value<30 then key="w" Else key="h" End If
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("Value", key ) Call oBag.AddValue("Message", value ) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Option Explicit On Error Resume Next Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(0) Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo
Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT version()", conn
Dim value value = rs.Fields(0).value rs.close conn.Close
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() If value<>Empty Then Call oBag.AddValue("Status","OK") Else Call oBag.AddValue("Status","-1") End If Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Option Explicit Dim DriverInfo DriverInfo = WScript.Arguments(0) Dim conn Set conn= CreateObject("ADODB.Connection") conn.Open DriverInfo
Dim dbName dbName = WScript.Arguments(0) Dim rs Set rs = CreateObject("ADODB.recordset")
rs.Open "SELECT COUNT(datid) AS current, (SELECT setting AS mc FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'max_connections') AS mc, d.datname FROM pg_database d LEFT JOIN pg_stat_activity s ON (s.datid = d.oid) WHERE d.datname = '"&dbName&"' GROUP BY 2,3 ", conn
Dim cur, max, value cur = rs.Fields(0).value max = rs.Fields(1).value value = CInt(cur) / CInt(max) * 100 rs.close conn.Close
Dim key If value < 85 Then key="h" End If If value >= 85 And value <=93 Then key = "w" End If If value > 93 Then key="c" End If
Dim oAPI, oBag Set oAPI = CreateObject("MOM.ScriptAPI") Set oBag = oAPI.CreatePropertyBag() Call oBag.AddValue("Status", key) Call oBag.AddValue("Message", value) Call oAPI.Return(oBag)

Configuration.ShellScript: #!/bin/sh DATABASE=postgres USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT version()") if [ -n "$OUT" ]; then echo "OK" else echo "ERROR" fi

#!/bin/sh DATABASE=postgres USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT round(100.*sd.xact_commit/(sd.xact_commit+sd.xact_rollback), 0) AS commitratio FROM pg_stat_database sd JOIN pg_database d ON (d.oid=sd.datid) JOIN pg_user u ON (u.usesysid=d.datdba) WHERE sd.xact_commit+sd.xact_rollback<>0 AND d.datname = '$2'") if [ $OUT -lt 75 ]; then echo "ERROR"$OUT elif [ $OUT -le 90] && [ $OUT -ge 75]; then echo "WARNING"$OUT else echo "OK" fi

#!/bin/sh DATABASE=postgres USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT setting From pg_settings WHere name='autovacuum'") if [ $OUT -ne "on" ]; then echo "ERROR" fi

#!/bin/sh DATABASE=postgres USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT round(100.*sd.blks_hit/(sd.blks_read+sd.blks_hit), 2) AS dhitratio, d.datname, u.usename FROM pg_stat_database sd JOIN pg_database d ON (d.oid=sd.datid) JOIN pg_user u ON (u.usesysid=d.datdba) WHERE sd.blks_read+sd.blks_hit<>0 AND d.datname = '$2'") if [ $OUT -lt 30 ]; then echo "ERROR"$OUT elif [ $OUT -le 70] && [ $OUT -ge 30]; then echo "WARNING"$OUT else echo "OK" fi

#!/bin/sh DATABASE=$2 USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT CASE WHEN idx_scan = 0 THEN 100 ELSE seq_scan::float4 / idx_scan * 100 END AS ratio, relname, seq_scan, idx_scan FROM pg_stat_user_tables WHERE relname='$3'") if [ $OUT -lt 30 ]; then echo "WARNING"$OUT else echo "OK" fi

#!/bin/sh DATABASE=postgres USERNAME=postgres OUT=$($1/psql -U "${USERNAME}" "${DATABASE}" -w -t -A -c "SELECT COUNT(datid) AS current, (SELECT setting AS mc FROM pg_settings WHERE name = 'max_connections') AS mc, d.datname FROM pg_database d LEFT JOIN pg_stat_activity s ON (s.datid = d.oid) WHERE d.datname = '$2' GROUP BY 2,3 ") if [ $OUT -gt 93 ]; then echo "ERROR"$OUT"%" elif [ $OUT -le 93] && [ $OUT -ge 85]; then echo "WARNING"$OUT"%" else echo "OK" fi
